word_mean: 囊：作为排泌物容器的膜袋
六腑之一，位于下腹前部中央，呈囊状。其主要功能是贮存水液，经气化排出尿液。

sentence.Network_en: The sky, swollen like a black bladder, rumbled and crackled.

sentence.Network_en: His diseased bladder left him incontinent.
sentence.Network_cn: 病变的膀胱使他小便失禁。

sentence.Network_en: Running on a full bladder is not a good idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 蹩住不撒尿不是一个好主意.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  blǣdre, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch blaar and German Blatter, also to blow

entry.def: Your bladder is the part of your body where urine is stored until it leaves your body.

means.word_mean: 1. a distensible membranous sac (usually containing liquid or gas)
2. a bag that fills with air
